description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

en.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

fr.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

es.description: Aave LINK es un token que genera intereses acuñado en el momento del depósito y quemado cuando se canjea. El aLINK está vinculado 1:1 al valor del LINK subyacente que se deposita en el protocolo Aave.

zh.description: Aave LINK 是个自生息代币，它在存款时铸造而在取款时销毁。aLINK 锚定的是 LINK 存入 Aave 之后的价值。
